briefdescription.para: Initialize the RTOS Kernel for creating objects.

parameterdescription.para: code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osKernelInitialize shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Start the RTOS Kernel with executing the specified thread.

parameterdescription.para: thread definition referenced with osThread.
pointer that is passed to the thread function as start argument.
code that indicates the execution status of the function

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osKernelStart shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Check if the RTOS kernel is already started.

parameterdescription.para: RTOS is not started (1) RTOS is started (-1) if this feature is disabled in FreeRTOSConfig.h

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osKernelRunning shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Get the value of the Kernel SysTick timer.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osKernelSysTick shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Create a thread and add it to Active Threads and set it to state READY.

parameterdescription.para: thread definition referenced with osThread.
pointer that is passed to the thread function as start argument.
ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osThreadCreate shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Return the thread ID of the current running thread.

parameterdescription.para: ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osThreadGetId shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Terminate execution of a thread and remove it from Active Threads.

parameterdescription.para: thread ID obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osThreadTerminate shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Pass control to next thread that is in state READY.

parameterdescription.para: code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osThreadYield shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Change priority of an active thread.

parameterdescription.para: thread ID obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId.
new priority value for the thread function.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osThreadSetPriority shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Get current priority of an active thread.

parameterdescription.para: thread ID obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId.
priority value of the thread function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osThreadGetPriority shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Wait for Timeout (Time Delay)

parameterdescription.para: time delay value
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

briefdescription.para: Create a timer.

parameterdescription.para: timer object referenced with osTimer.
osTimerOnce for one-shot or osTimerPeriodic for periodic behavior.
argument to the timer call back function.
ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osTimerCreate shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Start or restart a timer.

parameterdescription.para: timer ID obtained by osTimerCreate.
time delay value of the timer.
code that indicates the execution status of the function

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osTimerStart shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Stop a timer.

parameterdescription.para: timer ID obtained by osTimerCreate
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osTimerStop shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Delete a timer.

parameterdescription.para: timer ID obtained by osTimerCreate
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osTimerDelete shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Set the specified Signal Flags of an active thread.

parameterdescription.para: thread ID obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId.
specifies the signal flags of the thread that should be set.
signal flags of the specified thread or 0x80000000 in case of incorrect parameters.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osSignalSet shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Clear the specified Signal Flags of an active thread.

parameterdescription.para: thread ID obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId.
specifies the signal flags of the thread that shall be cleared.
signal flags of the specified thread or 0x80000000 in case of incorrect parameters.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osSignalClear shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Wait for one or more Signal Flags to become signaled for the current RUNNING thread.

parameterdescription.para: wait until all specified signal flags set or 0 for any single signal flag.
timeout value or 0 in case of no time-out.
flag information or error code.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osSignalWait shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Create and Initialize a Mutex object.

parameterdescription.para: mutex definition referenced with osMutex.
ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osMutexCreate shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Wait until a Mutex becomes available.

parameterdescription.para: mutex ID obtained by osMutexCreate.
timeout value or 0 in case of no time-out.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osMutexWait shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Release a Mutex that was obtained by osMutexWait.

parameterdescription.para: mutex ID obtained by osMutexCreate.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osMutexRelease shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Delete a Mutex.

parameterdescription.para: mutex ID obtained by osMutexCreate.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osMutexDelete shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Create and Initialize a Semaphore object used for managing resources.

parameterdescription.para: semaphore definition referenced with osSemaphore.
number of available resources.
ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osSemaphoreCreate shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Wait until a Semaphore token becomes available.

parameterdescription.para: semaphore object referenced with osSemaphore.
timeout value or 0 in case of no time-out.
of available tokens, or -1 in case of incorrect parameters.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osSemaphoreWait shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Release a Semaphore token.

parameterdescription.para: semaphore object referenced with osSemaphore.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osSemaphoreRelease shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Delete a Semaphore.

parameterdescription.para: semaphore object referenced with osSemaphore.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osSemaphoreDelete shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Create and Initialize a memory pool.

parameterdescription.para: memory pool definition referenced with osPool.
pool ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osPoolCreate shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Allocate a memory block from a memory pool.

parameterdescription.para: memory pool ID obtain referenced with osPoolCreate.
of the allocated memory block or NULL in case of no memory available.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osPoolAlloc shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Allocate a memory block from a memory pool and set memory block to zero.

parameterdescription.para: memory pool ID obtain referenced with osPoolCreate.
of the allocated memory block or NULL in case of no memory available.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osPoolCAlloc shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Return an allocated memory block back to a specific memory pool.

parameterdescription.para: memory pool ID obtain referenced with osPoolCreate.
address of the allocated memory block that is returned to the memory pool.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osPoolFree shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Create and Initialize a Message Queue.

parameterdescription.para: queue definition referenced with osMessageQ.
thread ID (obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId) or NULL.
queue ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osMessageCreate shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Put a Message to a Queue.

parameterdescription.para: message queue ID obtained with osMessageCreate.
message information.
timeout value or 0 in case of no time-out.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osMessagePut shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Get a Message or Wait for a Message from a Queue.

parameterdescription.para: message queue ID obtained with osMessageCreate.
timeout value or 0 in case of no time-out.
information that includes status code.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osMessageGet shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Create and Initialize mail queue.

parameterdescription.para: reference to the mail queue definition obtain with osMailQ
thread ID (obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId) or NULL.
queue ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osMailCreate shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Allocate a memory block from a mail.

parameterdescription.para: mail queue ID obtained with osMailCreate.
timeout value or 0 in case of no time-out.
to memory block that can be filled with mail or NULL in case error.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osMailAlloc shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Allocate a memory block from a mail and set memory block to zero.

parameterdescription.para: mail queue ID obtained with osMailCreate.
timeout value or 0 in case of no time-out.
to memory block that can be filled with mail or NULL in case error.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osMailCAlloc shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Put a mail to a queue.

parameterdescription.para: mail queue ID obtained with osMailCreate.
memory block previously allocated with osMailAlloc or osMailCAlloc.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osMailPut shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Get a mail from a queue.

parameterdescription.para: mail queue ID obtained with osMailCreate.
timeout value or 0 in case of no time-out
that contains mail information or error code.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osMailGet shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Free a memory block from a mail.

parameterdescription.para: mail queue ID obtained with osMailCreate.
pointer to the memory block that was obtained with osMailGet.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

simplesect.para: MUST REMAIN UNCHANGED: osMailFree shall be consistent in every CMSIS-RTOS.

briefdescription.para: Handles the tick increment.
Suspend execution of a thread.

parameterdescription.para: thread ID obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

briefdescription.para: Resume execution of a suspended thread.

parameterdescription.para: thread ID obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

briefdescription.para: Suspend execution of a all active threads.

parameterdescription.para: code that indicates the execution status of the function.

briefdescription.para: Resume execution of a all suspended threads.

parameterdescription.para: code that indicates the execution status of the function.

briefdescription.para: Delay a task until a specified time.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a variable that holds the time at which the task was last unblocked. PreviousWakeTime must be initialised with the current time prior to its first use (PreviousWakeTime = osKernelSysTick() )
time delay value
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

briefdescription.para: Abort the delay for a specific thread.

parameterdescription.para: thread ID obtained by osThreadCreate or osThreadGetId
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

briefdescription.para: Lists all the current threads, along with their current state and stack usage high water mark.

parameterdescription.para: A buffer into which the above mentioned details will be written
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

briefdescription.para: Receive an item from a queue without removing the item from the queue.

parameterdescription.para: message queue ID obtained with osMessageCreate.
timeout value or 0 in case of no time-out.
information that includes status code.

briefdescription.para: Get the number of messaged stored in a queue.

parameterdescription.para: message queue ID obtained with osMessageCreate.
of messages stored in a queue.

briefdescription.para: Get the available space in a message queue.

parameterdescription.para: message queue ID obtained with osMessageCreate.
space in a message queue.

briefdescription.para: Delete a Message Queue.

parameterdescription.para: message queue ID obtained with osMessageCreate.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

briefdescription.para: Create and Initialize a Recursive Mutex.

parameterdescription.para: mutex definition referenced with osMutex.
ID for reference by other functions or NULL in case of error..

briefdescription.para: Release a Recursive Mutex.

parameterdescription.para: mutex ID obtained by osRecursiveMutexCreate.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

briefdescription.para: Release a Recursive Mutex.

parameterdescription.para: mutex ID obtained by osRecursiveMutexCreate.
timeout value or 0 in case of no time-out.
code that indicates the execution status of the function.

briefdescription.para: Returns the current count value of a counting semaphore.

parameterdescription.para: semaphore_id ID obtained by osSemaphoreCreate.
value
